title: 1B/1B, 9- and 10-foot ceilings, Denver CO
posting_body: Welcome Home To Neon Local Enjoy a truly modern urban living experience at Neon Local Apartments – with on site retail options, a private parking garage, and a coveted rooftop deck and lounge right at your fingertips.
Our stunning interiors feature wood-style plank flooring, oversized walk-in closets, and in-home laundry options that will make you proud to call us home.
Not to mention how simple it is to make the most of every moment in Denver’s South Broadway neighborhood!
Located just moments away from the Alameda Light Rail Station and walking distance to favorites like Voodoo Doughnuts and Punch Bowl Social, convenience is literally yours for the taking.
There are countless infamous Denver breweries, hot spot hangouts, and eateries that South Broadway is known for right outside your door.
Find your new home and an illuminated lifestyle when you choose Neon Local Apartments!

Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Subway tile kitchen backsplash-9- and 10-foot ceilings-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Den-Wood-style plank flooring-Roller shades-Deep soaker style bathtubs-Oversized walk-in closets                                                                                        Featured amenity-Polished quartz countertops

Private parking garage with direct access elevators                                                                                         Featured amenity-Moments from the Alameda Light Rail Station-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-State-of-the-art fitness center and yoga studio                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi-Relaxing saltwater style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                         Featured amenity-Controlled-access bike storage and bike repair room-Onsite retail with unique eateries and shopping right at your doorstep-Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen and media area-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)
